string.text: Standard 9x21 SR1M Magazine with a capacity of 19 rounds. The SR1M is the latest development in Russian handgun technology, firing a proprietary 9x21 round also used in the SR-2 Veresk PDW.
Standard 9x19 PL15 Magazine with a capacity of 16 rounds.
Standard 9x19 SigP220 Magazine with a capacity of 12 rounds.
Standard 9x19 SigP226 Magazine with a capacity of 15 rounds.
Extended 9x19 USP Magazine with a capacity of 22 rounds.
Standard 9x19 Walther P99 Magazine with a capacity of 16 rounds.
